about_the_game:
Deluxe Edition includes Soundtrack and Wallpapers from the game.

Soundtrack: Three tracks from the game in FLAC/MP3:

00. Eternity
01. Infinity
02. Confusion

Wallpapers: 9 beautiful wallpapers from the game in 1920x1080 and 1280x720 resolution.
